about_the_game:
Manufactured from 1957, Keio 2000 series are one of Japanese vintage electric multiple units that are still in service until this day. Originated from Keio Railway, it is now still running with third hand status in Choshi electric railway. Previously second-hand status in Iyo railway from 1984 until retired in 2009. With an electrical system of DC 600/750 V, narrow gauge (1067 mm / 3 ft 6 in), and Maximum operating speed of 65 km/h, this makes Keio 2000 perfect for common Japanese rural railway.

Package Includes:

Choshi Railway 2000 Series, 8 cars (5 Combined Trainsets of different liveries)
Iyo Railway 800 Series, 6 Cars (4 Combined Trainsets of different liveries)
Features:


Realistic exterior and cab with full, detailed High-Resolution PBR textures + LOD
Realistic electromagnetic direct brake braking system, commonly used at Japanese EMU.
Animated passenger doors
Animated pantograph
JR-ATS (Automatic Train Stop) security equipment with sound fx
Night mode
Dedicated cab with full functional EMU Controller includes:
Functional master controller and switches
All indicator gauges are working
"one-man" service compatibility (open/close all passenger doors in trainset via cab button) + door closing indicator confirmation
Sound fx include:
Custom train brake sound
Door opening/closing sound
Custom brake compressor sound
Train starting sound
Realistic custom driving and rail joint sound

Manufactured from 1957, Keio 2000 series are one of Japanese vintage electric multiple units that are still in service until this day. Originated from Keio Railway, it is now still running with third hand status in Choshi electric railway. Previously second-hand status in Iyo railway from 1984 until retired in 2009. With an electrical system of DC 600/750 V, narrow gauge (1067 mm / 3 ft 6 in), and Maximum operating speed of 65 km/h, this makes Keio 2000 perfect for common Japanese rural railway.

Package Includes:

Choshi Railway 2000 Series, 8 cars (5 Combined Trainsets of different liveries)
Iyo Railway 800 Series, 6 Cars (4 Combined Trainsets of different liveries)

All indicator gauges are working

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: The Keio 2000 series are a Japanese electric multiple units that were originally used by the Keio Railway from 1957, they were later used by the Iyo railway from 1984 - 2009, and are now still running with the Choshi electric railway. These EMUs feature a range of scripted options and custom cabs!
supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian, French, German
